nodes.text: A male weapons officer served aboard the modified New Republic CR90 corvette Night Caller.

During the New Republic's campaign against Warlord Zsinj, the weapon's officer was assigned to the recently captured Night Caller, a modified CR90 corvette that Wraith Squadron managed to capture from Zsinj's fleet. His assignment was due to the loss of the ship's entire bridge crew—with the exception of Lieutenant Atril Tabanne—during the Battle of Talasea. The weapon's officer would later survive the battle between the New Republic and Zsinj's vassal Admiral Apwar Trigit on the planet Ession.

The weapons officer was remarkably in awe when acting Captain Wedge Antilles told him that the Imperial who accepted Antilles's offer of ceasing hostilities was none other than the famed Imperial pilot Baron Soontir Fel.
